This file contains the RTOS specific implementation for executing the DCAN test. More...

Functions

void DCANAppConfigIntr (void)
 Configure the DCAN interrupts to interrupt controller.
 
static void DCANAppIsr ()
 DCAN Interrupt 0 line service routine. This function will clear the status of the Tx/Rx message object interrupts. Handles the transmit interrupts and load the received data in buffer. Also checks for valid received data.
 
Int main ()
 

Detailed Description

This file contains the RTOS specific implementation for executing the DCAN test.
